ks.common.model
Interface ElementListener

All Known Implementing Classes:
BuildablePileView, CardView, ColumnView, DeckView, EmptyWidget, FanPileView, IntegerView, PileView, RowView, StringView, Widget
public interface ElementListener

Each Model has a View that is dependent upon that model. When the model changes, the view is alerted.

Creation date: (10/6/01 11:34:23 PM)

Author:
George T. Heineman (heineman@cs.wpi.edu)

Method Summary
 void modelChanged(Element elt)
          Alert listener that specific model element has changed.
